ygData.subject: Re: SPOILER info in Thicken Mana series SPOILER
ygData.msgSnippet: man, that just ruins it for those who didnt know how hehe. oh well, now the world will know! and there will be tons of huts in the brownie camp hehe. but, you
ygData.messageBody:
man, that just ruins it for those who didnt know how hehe.
oh well, now the world will know! and there will be tons of huts in the
brownie camp hehe.
but, you forgot to tell people how to get out of the camp hehe.
something for them to figure out....

----- Original Message -----
From: Tim Borelli <timb@...>
To: Jason Cent <jcent@...>
Cc: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, October 04, 1999 2:10 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] SPOILER info in Thicken Mana series SPOILER


> From: Tim Borelli <timb@...>
>
> ok, i dont want anyone gettin killed to get these spells from the
brownies,
> so i am gonna tell ya how to do it. scroll down =)
> .
> .
> .
> .
> .
> .
> .
> .
> .
>
> ok, first, go to the brownie camp, stay out of aggro range. cast
> benevolence/alliance (or whatever faction adjusting spell you can cast at
> the moment) on the brownie guards. this will make you dubious to them.
>
> run into the village, stand next to the brownie merchant, and cast minor
> illusion. you'll turn into a hut that they will be amiable to (i guess
they
> love what they live in!). buy the spells.
>
> that's that. you'll notice the brownies look a lot like the ones from
> Willow... =)
>
> Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, lazy 35th lvl enchanter on
> Cazic-Thule
>
> -------------------
> tim borrelli
> computer character animator
> "I dont suffer from insanity, I enjoy every minute of it..."
> Volition, Inc.
> timmyland@...
> http://www.timmyland.com
>
> >
